params.amounts: The amounts of the assets being flash-borrowed
params.assets: The addresses of the assets being flash-borrowed
params.initiator: The address that initiated the flash loan
params.params: Variadic packed params to pass to the receiver as extra information
params.premiums: The fee of each asset being flash-borrowed

returns._0: True if the execution of the operation succeeds, false otherwise

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: Executes an operation after receiving the flash-borrowed assets

documentation.text:
@title IFlashLoanReceiver
 @notice Interface for AAVE flashloan receiver
